MTBs and E-MTBs are equipped with parts, some of which have quite complex settings.
Most riders have not adjusted their forks, shocks, or tires optimally, but these settings can be crucial for a safe and pleasurable ride.
Tune, document, and compare your mountain bike settings with SAGLY.

A better suspension setup on your mountain bike means not only more comfort and more safety but also more fun and also faster riding.

MTB Suspension App to manage all your setups.

Mountain bike setups can be managed, edited, copied and much more. Your MTB setups are shown in a nice and clear way. A notes field helps you to keep track of additional info, like what in what weather conditions you created the setup, and so on. Adjustments for wet conditions are calculated automatically.

Another feature the MTB Suspension App supports the rider with suggested solutions for problems with the suspension settings. This helps the rider to continuously improve the setup, while riding.


BALANCE FEATURE

The balance feature checks if your MTB setup is balanced between the rear and the front part of your mountain bike and also gives hints how to improve and balance your suspension setup.


KNOW-HOW

In addition, the you receive general tips & tricks as well as an explanation of terms for optimizing and maintaining the your bike settings.

Another function supports you with suggested solutions for problems with the mountain bike settings. In this way you can tune your mtb setup.

The EASY SETUP GUIDE is part of the MTB suspension app SAGLY and guides you through a base setup by using the SAG. The user inputs the suspension part’s travel and the used travel when standing on the bike. This SAG calculator calculates the SAG based on your inputs and gives hints based on the result.

The EASY SETUP GUIDE of SAGLY helps you to find an appropriate base setup by giving you recommendations for your tire pressure based on your weight and the riding terrain.


EXPLORE SETUPS

Explore setups from other riders in the MTB suspension app SAGLY. Filter and Search by frame, fork, shock or tire-models. Sort by number of high-fives (likes), number of comments, and recently created. The setups of other riders are displayed with all information about the rider and the bikes the setup is created for.

You can high-five (like) those setups, create comments or even try those setups out and copy them to your setups.


OFFLINE SUPPORT

It does not really matter where you are or how remote the trail is, you can make changes anytime on your setup and SAGLY synchronizes the changes as soon as you have internet again.


FEEDBACK LOOP

Moreover SAGLY will keep in dialogue with you and ask you for feedback on how you feel on your latest changes, so that new recommendations can be given. A cycle of continuous improvement for your setups.


HISTORY FEATURE

Have a history of changes to track your progress on your setup. This feature is based on the “Bracketing” method. This method helps you find the perfect chassis settings and is used also in Downhill World Cup Racing.

Why SAGLY?

Mountain biking is not only a sport, hobby or lifestyle in our opinion. We associate mountain biking with much more. 

When you ride your mountain bike, you experience the nature, improve your physical and mental health, you get to meet other people, you encounter pleasure and enjoyment, you strengthen your will and sometimes you learn how to get up again. 

Those are just a view reasons, why we think it is worth working on an innovative mobile app like SAGLY. SAGLY’S technology helps you not only to document, tune and compare your mountain bike settings, but also to enjoy a really great activity, mountain biking.


OTHER REASON WHY A GOOD MTB SETUP MATTERS

Improved handling and control. Proper bike settings allows you to adjust the amount of support and damping that your bike provide. This can help you to maintain better control when riding over rough terrain.

title.label: SAGLY - MTB suspension setup - Anton Hoerl

So, why download the Silvretta Montafon app?

The app’s major functions at a glance:

-SHOP: 
Plan your day trips or book your entire holiday from the comfort of your own home: from accommodation, to lift passes and sports equipment, and fascinating experiences in the Silvretta Montafon alpine sports resort. 
And for last-minute travelers, the app allows you to book your lift pass with ease while en route to the mountains, and offers contactless printing at a PICK UP STATION, without having to go to a cash desk. 
Gift idea: The coolest print@home vouchers are available to purchase as gifts in the SiMo shop

-LIVE: 
All the latest info at a glance. Quickly check the weather, snow depth and facility opening times first thing in the morning. A glance at the webcams is enough to build your anticipation and give you even more holiday time: by using the app, you can see which lifts have no queues so you can hop right on!
Are you one of our lucky visitors spending several days in the Montafon mountains? Then the app is ideal for you, with its 10-day schedule of all the events and mountain experiences taking place. Boredom just doesn’t exist in Silvretta Montafon!

-ON SITE: 
Navigate to your preferred valley station and search for parking spaces. Up on the mountain, you’re spoiled for choice: Want to be the first to test the latest sports equipment from Intersport, book a lesson at the Ski school or Freeride station or sit back and enjoy a tasty cappuccino? ON SITE can’t make the decision for you, but it can show you in real time which shops and restaurants are open and where to find just what you’re looking for. You will also find all manner of useful and interesting information here for your stay in the valley.

-TIPS: 
Be as informed as the locals! Here, you can discover unmissable events and activities and gain in-depth insights into the world of Silvretta Montafon. And you’ll soon realize that Silvretta Montafon is a place to visit time and again, as there’s always something new to discover!

-DROP IN:
Your entry to the adventure playground that is Silvretta Montafon. Track your summit ascents, your mountain bike rides or your ski day on our 140 km of pistes. Connect with friends and battle for the top ranking. Who will cover the most kilometers on the pistes, who will climb the highest mountain? Collect pins and badges along the way, receive loyalty points and exchange them for vouchers in the app.
So get started: download the SiMo app and get going!

MantisX is a revolutionary training system that helps you improve your shooting precision.

Use of the app requires a MantisX Sensor which can be bought here:  http://www.mantisx.com. It attaches to any picatinny rail (or rail adapter if your firearm doesn't have a built-in rail). The internal electronics of the MantisX Sensor collect movement data before, during, and after your shot. The app analyzes the data and diagnoses your shooting mechanics, provides real-time coaching, and determines what you need to focus on to improve most quickly.

MantisX is a powerful tool that will make your training more efficient and effective.
